snippet: The man was killed when several artillery shells hit the offices of the Red Cross in Donetsk, in eastern Ukraine.
abstract: Swiss employee Laurent DuPasquier of International Committee of the Red Cross is killed when artillery shells hit the organization's offices in Donetsk, largest rebel-held city in eastern Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The man was killed when several artillery shells hit the offices of the Red Cross in Donetsk, in eastern Ukraine.

headline.main: Swiss Employee of Red Cross Killed in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Ukraine: Swiss Red Cross Worker Killed in Donetsk
